name: Ice Cube Smash
description:
Oh no, it's raining ice cubes! 
Stay alive on your floating island for as long as you can.

🧊 Instructions

- [WASD], [arrow keys] or [joystick] to move your player
- don't get smashed by ice cubes
- avoid spikes and don't jump off
- intuitive gameplay

⚡ Stay alive for as long as you can!

While playing, your score constantly increases. However, icecubes will fall faster and faster!
After playing, you can save your score on the cloud leaderboard.

🪙 Buy skins and boosts

- collect coins
- coin bombs 💣 will drop 10 extra coins when collected
- use coins to buy fancy skins and powerups

💡 Pro tip: Always jump upon the highest reachable ice cube
Enable Extreme Mode for an extra challenge!

Music: Xaf - Popsicle - https://soundcloud.com/xaf-249734583/popsicle/
